title: The Snow Woman
alternative_title: 怪談雪女 ; Kaidan Yuki-Onna ; La Donna Delle Nevi e Altri Racconti del Terrore
status: 怪談雪女 ; Kaidan Yuki-Onna ; La Donna Delle Nevi e Altri Racconti del Terrore
description:
Description :
        Six classic chilling stories populated with yokai, ghosts and demons. A work that enchants with aesthetic refinement and imaginative suggestion. Inspired by Lafcadio Hearn's celebrated Kwaidan: Stories and Studies of Strange Things (1904) and other famous legends from Japanese mythology such as the fascinating and frightening Snow Woman. An unforgettable journey into the mysterious Japanese spectral realm.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 5: Shokujinki, The Corpse-Eating Spirit
Vol.1 Chapter 4: The Dead In The Fog
Vol.1 Chapter 3: The One-Eyed Ghost Waterfall
